name: Deep Learning Colloquium — Advances in Vision
speaker: Dr. Ananya Sen
abstract: Overview of recent advances in computer vision and deep learning, including transformer-based architectures and their applications in medical imaging and autonomous systems.

name: Quantum Entanglement and Information Theory
speaker: Prof. Rajesh Mukherjee
abstract: A deep dive into the role of entanglement in quantum communication and its implications for quantum computing.

name: Astrophysics Frontiers — Dark Matter Mapping
speaker: Dr. Leena Das
abstract: Exploring the latest techniques in gravitational lensing and cosmic microwave background analysis to understand dark matter distribution.

name: Panel Discussion — Physics Education in India
speaker: Multiple Panelists
abstract: A roundtable discussion on curriculum reform, research opportunities, and student engagement in physics education across Indian universities.
